todos.content: Create basic feature branch structure for POS module
Implement POS module architecture with core, infrastructure, and presentation layers
Define TypeScript interfaces for Cart, CartItem, Product, and Sale entities
Create Zustand store for cart management
Implement repository layer with IndexedDB and Supabase sync
Create use cases for addItemToCart, removeItem, and processSale
Build POS screen UI with Tailwind and Shadcn components
Implement business logic validation for sales flow
Add unit tests for the cart store and use cases
Add documentation for the POS module components
